creator: dmccoy@gohealthcast.com
text:
Environment: Windows 2000sp1, JDK 1.3

Test Case:
Installed Tomcat3.3 milestone 2 (just the default Tomcat setup straight from 
the zip file, no apps).
Set JAVA_HOME and TOMCAT_HOME environment variables.
Launched Tomcat using startup.bat.
Using MSIE5.5, requested the 
URL: "http://localhost:8080/examples/jsp/security/protected".
Observations:
MSIE displayed a blank page.  If reload button was clicked, authentication page 
was shown correctly.  Tomcat window displayed the following error 
message: "2001-04-02 15:47:12 - ErrorHandler: Error loop for R( /examples 
+ /jsp/security/protected + null) error java.lang.NullPointerException".

I repeated the above test using the same environment, but requesting the page 
with Netscape 4.61.  Netscape requested authentication using Basic 
Authentication, then requested authentication again using Form authentication.  
The Tomcat window displayed the same error as when the page was requested with 
MSIE5.5.  The Netscape problem seems to match the problem described in bug#1055.

Tomcat Logs were as follows:
